results.description: You are action-oriented and focused on tangible results. You excel in environments where quick decisions and direct actions are needed.
recommended_resources: Book: 'The One Minute Manager' by Kenneth Blanchard
Podcast: 'WorkLife with Adam Grant' (Episodes on Productivity)

results.description: You are methodical and detail-oriented. You thrive in environments where organization, structure, and careful planning are crucial.
challenges: Sometimes slows down progress with too much detail
recommended_resources: Book: 'Getting Things Done' by David Allen
Course: 'Time Management Fundamentals' on LinkedIn Learning

results.description: You value collaboration and relationships. You excel when working with others and enjoy making connections and fostering team harmony.
recommended_resources: Book: 'How to Win Friends and Influence People' by Dale Carnegie

results.description: You are future-focused and innovative. You thrive in environments that value creativity, big ideas, and envisioning new possibilities.
recommended_resources: Book: 'Start with Why' by Simon Sinek

results.description: You adapt well across different situations, balancing action, planning, people skills, and vision. You bring a versatile approach to various scenarios.
challenges: May lack a distinct preference or strong focus
Can find it hard to make decisions when styles are in conflict
Risk of being spread too thin
recommended_resources: Book: 'The Art of Thinking Clearly' by Rolf Dobelli
Podcast: 'The Tim Ferriss Show' (Episodes on Adaptability)
